name: ZeroGPT
description: ZeroGPT provides AI-powered tools to detect AI-generated content and enhance writing with plagiarism checks, grammar correction, and more.
longDescription: ZeroGPT is an advanced AI content detection and writing enhancement platform designed to identify text generated by AI models like ChatGPT, GPT-4, and Gemini, while also offering tools to ensure content originality and quality. Its mission is to promote authenticity in digital content creation by providing accurate AI detection and comprehensive writing support for educators, students, content creators, and businesses. The platform uses proprietary DeepAnalyse™ technology to analyze text patterns and determine their origin with high accuracy. ZeroGPT serves users globally with multilingual support, making it versatile for diverse applications. It also offers additional utilities like summarization, paraphrasing, and citation generation to streamline content creation. The website caters to those seeking to maintain academic integrity, optimize SEO-friendly content, or verify the authenticity of written materials.
features: AI Content Detector identifies AI-generated text with over 98% accuracy using DeepAnalyse™ technology, ensuring content authenticity across multiple languages.
Plagiarism Checker scans billions of sources to verify text originality, helping users maintain academic and professional integrity.
Grammar Checker corrects grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors, improving the readability and professionalism of written content.
Text Summarizer condenses long texts while preserving context, enabling quick insights for busy users like educators and journalists.
Paraphraser rewrites text to maintain meaning with unique wording, aiding content creators in producing original content.
AI Email Generator creates clear, professional emails in any language, saving time for business communication.
Word Counter tracks words, characters, and keyword density in real-time, assisting writers in meeting content requirements.
Citation Generator automatically creates citations for books, websites, and journals, simplifying academic and professional referencing.

faqs.question: What is ZeroGPT used for?
faqs.answer: ZeroGPT is used to detect AI-generated text, check for plagiarism, and enhance writing through tools like grammar correction, summarization, and citation generation.

faqs.question: Is ZeroGPT free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, ZeroGPT offers a free plan with up to 15,000 characters per AI detection and limited access to tools like summarization and grammar checking.

faqs.question: How accurate is ZeroGPT’s AI detection?
faqs.answer: ZeroGPT claims over 98% accuracy in detecting AI-generated text using its DeepAnalyse™ technology, though results may vary with complex or paraphrased content.

faqs.question: Can ZeroGPT detect text in multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, ZeroGPT supports multilingual detection, allowing users to analyze text in various languages with high accuracy.

faqs.question: Does ZeroGPT store user data?
faqs.answer: ZeroGPT does not store or retain user data submitted for analysis, ensuring privacy as outlined in its Privacy Policy.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of ZeroGPT’s premium plans?
faqs.answer: Premium plans offer higher character limits, batch file processing, ad-free experience, and access to advanced tools like ZeroCHAT-5 and detailed PDF reports.

faqs.question: Can ZeroGPT be integrated into workflows?
faqs.answer: Yes, ZeroGPT provides an API for organizations to integrate AI detection and other features into their systems.

faqs.question: Who can benefit from using ZeroGPT?
faqs.answer: Educators, students, content creators, and businesses use ZeroGPT to ensure content authenticity, improve writing quality, and maintain academic integrity.
